BackstoryDef.title: Blacksmith's apprentice
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into a long bloodline of blacksmiths, and started picking up the trade from a young age. One night, [PAWN_possessive] village was invaded.\n\n[PAWN_nameDef] was lucky to escape with [PAWN_possessive] life, but the violence scarred [PAWN_objective] for life.

BackstoryDef.title: Hunter's child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into a somewhat poor family who relied on hunting to get by. [PAWN_possessive] parents taught [PAWN_objective] the basics of the trade: shooting, setting up traps and skinning animals - and that animals should only be used for sustenance.

BackstoryDef.title: Medieval urchin
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] ran away from a bad situation at home and became a street urchin, quickly getting a grasp of pickpocketing, lying and brawling.

BackstoryDef.title: Monastery servant
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Overwhelmed by grief after losing someone close, [PAWN_nameDef] didn’t quite know what to do and decided to join a monastery, where [PAWN_pronoun] spent [PAWN_possessive] early years learning to write books and create art for the monks to sell.

BackstoryDef.title: Warband recruit
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: War ravaged [PAWN_nameDef]’s village, leaving [PAWN_objective] with nothing but the will to do the right thing and enlist in the local army. This was a great opportunity to learn the basic fighting skills needed to survive.

BackstoryDef.title: Beggar
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] begged on the corners for a coin or a piece of bread from as early as [PAWN_pronoun] can remember, observing, listening and talking with countless travelers.

BackstoryDef.title: Quarry child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: For [PAWN_possessive] father's crimes, [PAWN_nameDef] was sent to work in a quarry, breaking rocks every day of [PAWN_possessive] childhood.

BackstoryDef.title: Collier
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born to a family of destitute colliers bound in perpetual debt-slavery. Their lives consisted of toil and misery in the mines.

BackstoryDef.title: Feudal farm kid
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was the child of a medieval farmer, and was expected to follow in [PAWN_possessive] father's footsteps.

BackstoryDef.title: Medieval peasant
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up pulling carts and digging holes on a medieval world. Simple manual labor is [PAWN_possessive] oldest companion, along with the master's lash. [PAWN_pronoun] didn't learn to read until age nine.

BackstoryDef.title: Medieval thief
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up poor and hungry on a medieval planet, learning to fend for [PAWN_objective]self. At first, [PAWN_pronoun] only took what [PAWN_pronoun] needed, but later, [PAWN_pronoun] learned to take what [PAWN_pronoun] wanted.

BackstoryDef.title: Medieval plower
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] lived on a planet where kings and queens ruled with little regard for the peasants beneath them. [PAWN_possessive] family owned a large farm, but the king took most of the food it produced, leaving [PAWN_nameDef]'s family poor and unable to pay for [PAWN_possessive] education.

BackstoryDef.title: Medieval slave
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Born into slavery on a feudal world, [PAWN_nameDef] never knew [PAWN_possessive] parents, but only endless toil.

BackstoryDef.title: Medieval squire
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Born to a noble family on a medieval world, [PAWN_nameDef] became a squire. [PAWN_possessive] training included falconry, fencing, and wrestling, often done wearing armor.

BackstoryDef.title: Medieval witch
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] became interested in alchemy when [PAWN_pronoun] was a young child. [PAWN_pronoun] was taken in and taught basic herbalism, medicine and chemistry by an elderly recluse who claimed to have come from the stars. However, church leaders deemed their work witchcraft, sentenced [PAWN_nameDef]'s mentor to imprisonment, and sent [PAWN_nameDef] to an orphanage until [PAWN_pronoun] came of age.

BackstoryDef.title: Stablehand
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a stablehand on a medieval planet, mucking dung every day to earn [PAWN_possessive] keep.

BackstoryDef.title: Trainee alchemist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up on a medieval world. [PAWN_pronoun] learned the basics of alchemy and medicine in one the few monastic schools on [PAWN_possessive] planet.
